TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceThrottlingBehavior extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior

summary.span: 設定可讓您調整服務效能的執行階段輸送量設定。

span.span: Configures run-time throughput settings that enable you to tune service performance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 類別來控制可協助您的應用程式避免用完記憶體的各種輸送量設定。Use the class to control various throughput settings that help prevent your application from running out of memory. 屬性會限制目前在 上處理的訊息數目。The property limits the number of messages that currently process across a . 屬性會限制 上執行一次的 物件數目。The property limits the number of objects that execute at one time across a . 屬性會限制 物件可以接受的工作階段數目。The property limits the number of sessions a object can accept. 由於執行階段負載平衡需要執行應用程式的經驗，因此透過應用程式組態檔使用 是最常見的修改執行，使服務效能最佳化的方法。Because run-time load balancing requires experience running the application, using the through an application configuration file is the most common method of modifying execution to maximize service performance. > [!NOTE] > 每次達到這些屬性值時，就會寫入追蹤。A trace is written every time the value of these properties is reached. 第一個追蹤會寫入成為警告。The first trace is written as a warning. 您也可以設定此屬性的值使用[ <serviceThrottling> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicethrottling.md)應用程式組態檔中的項目。You can also set the values of this attribute by using the [<serviceThrottling>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicethrottling.md) element in an application configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用應用程式組態檔的 ，將 、 和 屬性設定為 1。The following code example shows the use of from an application configuration file that sets the , , and properties to 1 as an example. 至於特定應用程式的最佳設定，則需要透過實際經驗來判斷。Real-world experience determines what the optimal settings are for any particular application. [!code-xml[ServiceThrottlingBehavior#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicethrottlingbehavior/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當以程式設計的方式新增設定的 時，使用建構函式。Use the constructor when adding a configured programmatically.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxConcurrentCalls { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定 上主動處理的訊息數目上限。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of messages actively processing across a .

value.span: 在服務內作用中訊息的上限。

span.span: The upper limit of active messages in the service.

value.span: 預設為 16 乘以處理器計數。

span.span: The default is 16 times the processor count.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定 物件上主動處理的訊息數目上限。The property specifies the maximum number of messages actively processing across a object. 每個通道可以有一個暫止訊息，而這個訊息在 開始處理它之前，不會計算在 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 的值中。Each channel can have one pending message that does not count against the value of until [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] begins to process it. 您也可以設定此屬性的值使用[ <serviceThrottling> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicethrottling.md)應用程式組態檔中的項目。You can also set the values of this attribute by using the [<serviceThrottling>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicethrottling.md) element in an application configuration file. > [!WARNING] > 應該設定為小於排入佇列的案例中的 SQL 連接集區大小。 should be set to less than the SQL connection pool size in queued scenarios. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用應用程式組態檔的 ，將 、 和 屬性設定為 1。The following code example shows the use of from an application configuration file that sets the , , and properties to 1 as an example. 至於特定應用程式的最佳設定，則需要透過實際經驗來判斷。Real-world experience determines what the optimal settings are for any particular application. [!code-xml[ServiceThrottlingBehavior#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicethrottlingbehavior/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxConcurrentInstances { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定服務中一次可以執行的 物件數目上限。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of objects in the service that can execute at one time.

value.span: 同時存在服務中的 物件數目上限。

span.span: The maximum number of objects in the service at one time.

value.span: 預設值是值的總和和值。

span.span: The default is the sum of the value of and the value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定服務中 物件的數目上限。The property specifies the maximum number of objects in the service. 請務必牢記 屬性和 屬性之間的關聯性。It is important to keep in mind the relationship between the property and the property. 如果 是 ，則產生的值會是工作階段的總數。If is , the resulting value is the total number of sessions. 如果 是 ，則產生的值是同時呼叫的數目。If is , the resulting value is the number of concurrent calls. 如果訊息在已有最大數目的 物件存在時抵達，則會保留該訊息，直到 物件關閉為止。If a message arrives while the maximum number of objects already exist, the message is held until an object closes. 您也可以設定此屬性的值使用[ <serviceThrottling> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicethrottling.md)應用程式組態檔中的項目。You can also set the values of this attribute by using the [<serviceThrottling>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicethrottling.md) element in an application configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用應用程式組態檔的 ，將 、 和 屬性設定為 1。The following code example shows the use of from an application configuration file that sets the , and properties to 1 as an example. 至於特定應用程式的最佳設定，則需要透過實際經驗來判斷。Real-world experience determines what the optimal settings are for any particular application. [!code-xml[ServiceThrottlingBehavior#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicethrottlingbehavior/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxConcurrentSessions { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定 物件一次可以接受的工作階段數目上限。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of sessions a object can accept at one time.

value.span: 服務主機接受工作階段的數目上限。

span.span: The maximum number of sessions a service host accepts.

value.span: 預設為 100 次的處理器計數。

span.span: The default is 100 times the processor count.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定 物件可以接受的工作階段數目上限。The property specifies the maximum number of sessions a object can accept. 請務必了解，這個情況中的工作階段不僅是支援可靠工作階段的通道 (例如， 支援工作階段，但不包括可靠的工作階段)。It is important to understand that sessions in this case does not mean only channels that support reliable sessions (for example, supports sessions but does not include reliable sessions). 每個接聽程式物件只能有一個暫止通道工作階段，不會計算的值直到 WCF 接受通道工作階段，並開始處理訊息。Each listener object can have one pending channel session that does not count against the value of until WCF accepts the channel session and begins processing messages on it. 這個屬性在運用工作階段的案例中最為有用。This property is most useful in scenarios that make use of sessions. 當這個屬性設定為小於用戶端執行緒數目的值時，來自多個用戶端的要求可能會在相同通訊端連線中形成佇列。When this property is set to a value less than the number of client threads, the requests from multiple clients may get queued in the same socket connection. 如果服務上的開啟工作階段數量已達到 `MaxConcurrentSessions`，來自尚未以服務建立工作階段之用戶端的要求將遭到封鎖，直到服務以其他用戶端關閉其工作階段為止。The requests from the client that has not created a session with the service will be blocked till the service closes its session with the other clients if number of open sessions on the service has reached `MaxConcurrentSessions`. 未處理的用戶端要求會逾時，而且服務會突然關閉工作階段。The client requests that are not served get timed out and the service closes the session abruptly. 若要避免這種情況，請從不同的應用程式定義域執行用戶端執行緒，如此，要求訊息就可以進入不同的通訊端連線。To avoid this situation, run the client threads from different app domains so that the request messages go into different socket connections. 您也可以設定此屬性的值使用[ <serviceThrottling> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicethrottling.md)應用程式組態檔中的項目。You can also set the values of this attribute by using the [<serviceThrottling>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicethrottling.md) element in an application configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用應用程式組態檔的 ，將 、 和 屬性設定為 1。The following code example shows the use of from an application configuration file that sets the , , and properties to 1 as an example. 至於特定應用程式的最佳設定，則需要透過實際經驗來判斷。Real-world experience determines what the optimal settings are for any particular application. [!code-xml[ServiceThrottlingBehavior#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicethrottlingbehavior/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#3)]
